documents.name: SIE Registration — SIE-EP-0045
documents.notes: Registration with energy market regulator.

documents.name: Ley 57-07 Tax Exemption Application
documents.notes: 10-year income tax exemption under renewable energy law.

documents.name: Construction Permit
documents.notes: Required before construction start. Depends on EPC contract.

documents.name: Decreto 517-25 BESS Compliance Filing
documents.notes: BESS mandate compliance documentation. Must include 25MW/100MWh specs.

documents.name: ETED No-Objection Letter
documents.notes: Approved Feb 2024, revalidated May 2025. 138kV POI.

documents.name: Interconnection Study
documents.notes: Technical study for 138kV connection at Peravia Solar I & II.

documents.name: Transmission Line Design (4.5 km)
documents.notes: Double-circuit 138kV line from project to substation.

documents.name: PPA Term Sheet
documents.notes: Draft PPA at $70/MWh with 1.5% annual escalation.

documents.name: Project Budget & CAPEX Breakdown
documents.notes: $55M total CAPEX with detailed line items.

documents.notes: See models/25-year-cashflow.js — 3 scenarios.

documents.notes: Target: IFC, DFC, or OPIC-successor. $33M senior debt.

documents.notes: Builder's all-risk, delay in start-up, operational all-risk.

documents.notes: Full EIA submitted and approved.
